div.p: The PHP development team announces the immediate availability of PHP 5.4.7 and PHP 5.3.17. These releases fix over 20 bugs. All users of PHP are encouraged to upgrade to PHP 5.4.7, or at least 5.3.17.
Key enhancements in these releases include:

ul.li: Fixed bug #62955 (Only one directive is loaded from "Per Directory Values" Windows registry).
Fixed bug #62460 (php binaries installed as binary.dSYM).

div.p: The full list of changes are recorded in the ChangeLog.
For source downloads of PHP 5.4.7 and PHP 5.3.17 please visit our downloads page, Windows binaries can be found on windows.php.net/download/.
The list of changes are recorded in the ChangeLog.
